attributes.action: please STOP the closure of Westfield Court Nursery School, Edinburgh.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Westfield Court Nursery, Edinburgh has been serving the community for over 53 years.   The nursery has seen three generations of some families go through the doors and has always had strong links with the local community.  Westfield Court Nursery has gained the reputation as a centre of excellence for supporting children with complex additional support needs in an inclusive mainstream setting.
